alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:21AM EDT until June 12 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 721 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Glendale, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill and Piney Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
